pullrequest.title: fixed analysis loop freezing after script restart

content.raw:
This happened quite often in our lab in the last time \(lots of misjudgment considering runtime of scripts\) which made this worth looking into.

Putting a error into `self.from_worker` might not be the most elegant solution, as it pauses the queue\(could be a good thing sometimes\) and the newly started analysis script is marked as being in a error state, but it gets the job done in the cases where one needs to actually restart a script to cancel it's execution.
